weather.question: I fall from the sky and make things wet. Kids love to play in me, especially in puddles. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I come from clouds.
☔ You might need an umbrella.
🐷 Muddy puddles are made with me!

weather.question: I am hot and yellow, and I shine in the sky. I give light and help plants grow. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 I appear during the day.
😎 You might need sunglasses when I'm around.
🌻 Plants turn to face me.

weather.question: I am white and cold, and I fall from the sky in winter. You can build a snowman with me and have snowball fights. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am made of frozen water.
🧣 You need to bundle up when I fall.
☃️ I can be packed into snowballs.

weather.question: I am a big storm with strong winds that can cause a lot of damage. I am named and spin around over the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I am often named.
🏡 People might board up their windows when I'm coming.
🌀 I have a very strong center called an eye.

weather.question: I am a bright flash in the sky during a storm. I make a loud noise called thunder. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I am a powerful electrical discharge.
🌩️ I often happen at the same time as thunder.
💥 You should go inside when you see me.

weather.question: I am a blanket of water droplets that hangs low in the air, close to the ground. Sometimes I make it hard to see while driving. What am I?

hints.text: 🌫️ I am like a cloud on the ground.
🚗 You need to drive slowly when I am thick.
👻 Things look blurry in me.

weather.question: I am a long, cold season when it snows and the trees are bare. Many animals hibernate during this time. What am I?

hints.text: 🗓️ I come after autumn.
🧣 You need a warm coat and hat during me.
🐻 Some animals sleep through me.

weather.question: I am made of frozen raindrops that fall during thunderstorms. I can be small or as large as a golf ball and can cause damage to cars! What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am sometimes mistaken for snow.
🤕 I can damage cars.
🏐 I can be as small as a pea or as big as a golf ball.

weather.question: I measure how hot or cold something is. You use me to decide if you need a jacket or not. What am I?

hints.text: 🌡️ You can measure me with a thermometer.
☀️ I can be measured in Celsius or Fahrenheit.
🥶 I can tell you if it's freezing outside.

weather.question: I am the air moving around us. I can be gentle, or I can be strong and knock things over. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I make leaves rustle.
💨 A kite needs me to fly.
🌬️ I can be measured with an anemometer.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🐘 I am the largest land animal.
💧 I use my trunk to drink water.

animal.question: I meow and love to chase mice. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I like to play with yarn.
🐈 I have whiskers and soft fur.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🚶 I am often walked on a leash.
🐕 I am a loyal companion.

animal.question: I say 'Moo' and give milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I eat grass in a field.
🐄 I am often black and white.
🥛 I am used to make cheese and butter.

animal.question: I quack and swim in the water. What am I?

hints.text: 🦆 I often live near ponds.
🍞 People throw bread to me.
🐥 My babies are called ducklings.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I have spots on my fur.
🌍 I live in Africa.
🍃 I can reach the highest branches.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I look like a horse.
🌿 I eat grass.
📸 My stripes are unique to each individual.

animal.question: I swing from trees and eat bananas. What am I?

hints.text: 🙊 I make loud noises.
🐒 I am a type of primate.
🌴 I live in the jungle.

animal.question: I live in the ocean, have eight arms, and can squirt ink. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I am an invertebrate.
🌊 I am very intelligent.
💙 I can change color to camouflage myself.

animal.question: I am a reptile with a hard shell that lives in the water or on land. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I am very slow.
🥗 I eat plants and insects.
🏠 I can hide my head inside my shell for protection.
